*   This is an unordered list item that has multiple characters. Many multiples
    of characters, in fact. So many, that it looks as though it ought to wrap.
    More than once. Twice, in fact.

    of characters, in fact. So many, that it looks as though it ought to wrap.
    More than once. Twice, in fact.

    More than once. Twice, in fact.
